extensionDescription.message: Deletes history older than a specified amount of days.

optionDaysText.message: Number of days to keep history

optionDaysInfo.message: Defaults to 0. Will delete history older than midnight on the specified number of days ago. Will have no effect if behavior is set to disabled or delete all.

optionIdleLengthInfo.message: Amount of time (seconds) the browser should idle before triggering. (Defaults to 60, Minimum 15)

optionDeleteModeInfo.message: Choose whether the extension should trigger on browser startup, or after idling for the idle length. (Defaults to idle). If set to startup, Idle Length has no effect.

optionNotificationsInfo.message: Request notifications permission using the below button, and then set the option to Show Notifications to enable notifications when history is deleted.

optionNotificationsInfoNew.message: Whether a notification should be shown when history is deleted.

manualDeleteInfo.message: Press the button below to delete history manually.

notificationEnabledBody.message: Notifications will now appear when history is deleted

historyDeletedNotificationBody.message: History from before $END$ was deleted at $NOW$

optionBehaviorInfo.message: Decides what history the extension should delete when it triggers.

behaviorDays.message: Delete history older than a specified amount of days

optionFilterHistoryInfo.message: Whether to prevent certain sites from being deleted. If enabled, the total number of history items deleted will be counted.

optionFilterListInfo.message: A list of sites that will not be deleted. Filter History must be enabled for this to take effect. Every line should contain a hostname that will be excluded from deletion.

statisticsDeleteCountWarning.message: (History filtering must be enabled to track statistics)

lastRunNever.message: History has not been cleared yet.
